oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Knoxville (Tenn.) 1926 Mortality Rates Chart
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Handwritten Colored to White Death Ratio chart for 1926. Printed chart compares mortality rates for races and causes. Causes listed: Old Age, Suicide, Homicide, Typhoid Fever, Cancer, Pellagra, Influenza, Diseases of Early Infancy, Diarrhea and Enteritis, Diseases of the Kidneys, Accidents, Pneumonia (All Forms), Tuberculosis (All Forms), and Diseases of the Heart. No information on sheet of author or source. Page no. 75 at bottom.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African Americans; Statistics; Charts; Death;
